description: Literally a bowl for babies. Slang for using a small serving bowl to share food, or to describe someone with a small appetite.

examples.chinese: 我也要吃老公给我分的宝宝碗
examples.translation: I also want to eat from the small bowl my husband served me

examples.chinese: 男朋友胃口很小,出去吃饭只要吃一个宝宝碗就够了
examples.translation: My boyfriend has a small appetite, eating just one small bowl is enough for him when we go out

examples.chinese: 和朋友出去吃饭但不饿,我就用了宝宝碗
examples.translation: VWent out to eat with friends but wasn't hungry, so I just used a small bowl
